meanings.definition: A person who engages in a physical fight or struggle.
meanings.sent1: The tussors in the playground were playfully wrestling.
meanings.sent2: The two tussors were evenly matched in the boxing ring.
meanings.sent3: The tussors ended up laughing after their friendly scuffle.
meanings.sent4: The tussors on the field were like gladiators in ancient times.
meanings.sent5: The image of the tussors grappling stayed in my mind.

meanings.definition: A fabric made from silk or a similar material, typically used for clothing.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful dress made of soft tussors.
meanings.sent2: The tussors of the curtains added elegance to the room.
meanings.sent3: The tussors of the gown shimmered under the lights.
meanings.sent4: The tussors felt like a gentle caress against her skin.
meanings.sent5: The tussors of the fabric flowed gracefully as she walked.
